boardgame.name: Space Hulk
宇宙荒舟
boardgame.description: Space Hulk is a light miniatures wargame set in the Warhammer 40K universe. It has a relatively simple rule-set (compared to Warhammer 40K itself) and is known for its fast play and immersive theme (think the movie Aliens)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You lay out corridors and rooms that represent a space hulk, a large disabled ship floating in space. The Space Marines wear powerful space battle suits and carry heavy weaponry. The Genestealers (reminiscent of the alien in Alien) are naked, except for their quick movement, multiple clawed arms capable of ripping through Terminator armor and their seemingly endless numbers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each game is played as a scenario. The Space Marines win by completing a certain goal, such as retrieving an artifact and escaping alive. The Genestealers win by stopping the Space Marines from achieving their goal, usually by killing them all. A unique mechanism is that the Genestealers have no time limit for their turn, but the Space Marines have a 3 minute time limit, and less if a sergeant is killed. This simulates the fact that Genestealers move so much quicker and adds a lot of tension to the game for the Marine player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The miniatures are excellent although you do have to paint them yourselves and the modular board is very well done._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Deathwing Expansion adds new personnel, weapons, rules for multilevel hulks, new missions and a mission generator along with some complexity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Genestealer Expansion adds new marines, weapons, Genestealer Hybrids who can use weapons and new missions. There are also rules for psychic powers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There was also the Space Hulk Campaign Book that can be linked for longer games. This book also added rules for traitor Marines and new weapons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Even with all rules in place the game does not get too complicated and is a very good introduction to Warhammer 40K._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Hulk (2nd Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Hulk (3rd Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 30: The games that got away

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Spacehulk/Genestealer/Deathwing set combined. These are all combined in one set, All the essential parts are present however its not 100% complete. Unfortunately there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s here no good inventory available. Here is an inventory of what there is:- Space Hulk box (One corner repaired, little rubbed on the edges up but sound) Space Hulk missions and background Space Hulk Rules Genestealer rules and Missions booklet Deathwing rules and Missions booklet (Tape on the spine to prevent further splitting, two intro pages in poor condition rest okay) 11* Space marine Figures 18* Genestealer Figures (2 missing an arm) 3* Librarians(One has a damaged weapon) 8* Hybrids (1 missing an arm) 78* Floor tiles 36 * Object tiles (Hole, Junk, covers, Cryo etc..) 13* Geotiles 20*Door counters 20*Slotta bases 44*Psychic attack cards 2*Hellfire Markers 2*Vortex Marker 2*Stasis Markers 2*Miasma Markers 2*Jinx Markers 2*Warp Time Markers 5*Power Field Generator Blips 1*Trump Suit Counter 4*False Alarm/Alarm Markers 37*Green Blip Markers 2*Redblip Markers 1*CAT marker 1*Ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Log 4*Plasma gun Fired/recharging counter 8*Overwatch/Jam counter 12*Flamer effect marker From my best estimation the counters appear to be complete, but there are no dice and there appears to be four Space marine, eight Genestealers and two Librarian figures missing. But even with these missing the game is quite playable and you have all the expansion sets in one

Complete Second edition space hulk. Box in very good condition. Floor tiles in almost new condion. 19 of the 20 genestealers have white under coat. The marines are painted red and need a finish touch to let them look fantastic. Paying with paypal will be 4% extra. Any question just ask. BTW I have also a complete, no manual (you get a copy of the english rules) and dice first edition set for sale. Miniatures not painted still on sprue !! Ask for the price for this set. Also a complete set of first edition floor available + doors. ask for the price for this set. Picture is as reference (not mine). You can see how the marines look.

Double boxed set of the game, includes 24 genestealers, 10 power armored marines and 10 plastic terminators (the good 2nd edition ones). All the white dwarf add ons are included as well. Condition is superb - slight tear in the box corner top. Interested in selling the game whole, not for trade. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be happy to take pictures of the game if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like. Shipping is included in the price for the US, it would cost the buyer the actual amount if shipped out of the US. Thanks!

Box has some edge wear and one torn corner. Components: rule and scenario books, score cards, rooms, corners, corridors, intersections, doors, bulkheads, dead ends, stands, dice counted and complete, in excellent condition. All 10 space marines present, not all of them are fully assembled or painted. All 20 genestealers present, one has a broken hand. 28 of the 30 bases for figures present; hopefully not all 30 figures are ever used in any scenario, but they are the standard Games Workshop stand-up bases. Game is supposed to come with 71 counters, but has 85. 1 of 4 space marine entry areas missing (no scenario calls for more than two). Game also includes a strange plastic piece that I cannot account for.

game complete, miniatures painted (marines only). the box is... hum... tired but otherwise, the game is fully playable and in perfect condition ! Ask for shipping charges (i live in France) payment: international money order (i_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll give my IBAN and BIC on demand)

Mint/unpunched not shrinkwrapped. Part of a LARGE estate sale - most of the games are being sold to ONE buyer, some games are being sold to gamers... Shipment will be in mid-late June, when full collection of games is removed from storage. Will accept Paypal - but buyer must pay all associated fees. Will ship worldwide. For shipments in US, game will be shipped priority mail. For worldwide shipments, amount charged will be actual cost.
Partially punched but never played. Game complete but box is slightly dented from storage.

Fantastic shape w/ unpunched miniatures. Paypal through your checking acct preferred, otherwise personal check or money order accepted. If anyone purchases this item, I will offer the Deathwing expansion with it for $84.99 ($5 off).

This sale includes both Space Hulk (1st Edition) and the Genestealer expansion together. I am the original owner of both. They have been kept in a smoke-free home. SPACE HULK: All game pieces are originals and are in very good condition. The game box has moderate shelf wear. 100% of components are present and intact (marine antenae included). The game has been played five times. Contents: 30 assembled plastic miniatures (18 fully painted, 3 partially painted, 9 unpainted) 49 corridor/room sections 20 doors 21 genestealer blips 12 flamer blips 1 C.A.T counter 8 overwatch/jam counters 6 C.P. counters 1 rules manual 1 mission manual 5 dice GENESTEALER: All game pieces are originals and are in very good condition. The game box has moderate shelf wear (including a small piece of duct-tape covering a small hole). 100% of components are present and intact. The exapansion has never been played. Contents: 15 plastic miniatures (5 fully painted marines, 4 unpainted genestealers, 6 unassembled genestealers) 8 corridor/room sections 19 counters 17 genestealer blips 44 psychic attack cards 3 mission geotiles 1 psychic track counter 1 trump suit counter 1 rules manual 1 mission manual -No sales tax will be applied. -Game will be shipped in a sturdy box and filled with packing peanuts. -Will be shipped within two business days of receiving payment. -Shipping cost TBD (but will only cover my cost, nothing more). -A tracking number will be provided at no additional cost. -Insurance is optional, but recommended.

Due to lack of time I´m offering this fantastic classic in UNPLAYED _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; UNPUNCHED CONDITION!! All parts are complete, the figurines still in their frames, nothing is painted or glued, floor tiles still unpunched! The box, however, is unfortunately missing. But can this prevent you from playing this great game...?
This is why I declared it to be in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Like New Condition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, but in terms of the playing material it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s factory new! 1st editon with German rule books (if desired) only but translations can be found easily on the web. Everything will be carefully packed for transit in a sturdy cardboard box! I attached some original snapshots below - if you need more pics or information please feel free to drop me a line...! All games come from a private collection (non-smoking environment)! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). Have fun playing, Flix! --------------------------------------------- NEW SHIPPING CONDITIONS TO US! PLEASE READ!! --------------------------------------------- I can FROM TIME TO TIME send parcels to the US through a friend of mine who is US Army member in Germany. + Cheaper shipping (13,90 EURO for Priority Mail) + including insurance + Much faster delivery (USPS Airmail) = More satisfaction Please contact me if you want to use this service so I can tell you when the next shipping is goint to be sent! Regular SHIPPING with DHL (=German Post): -------------------------------------------------------- _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 1000 g without insurance (e.g. small cardgames): Europe: EUR 8,00 US/Canada: EUR 10,00 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 2000 g without insurance: Germany: EUR 4,30 EU: EUR 10,00 US/Canada/Rest of Europe: EUR 15,00 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 kg with insurance Germany: EUR 7,00 Europe: EUR 19,00 - 32,00 (depending on country) US/Canada: EUR 34,00

Box has some dipping (unavoidable with these GW boxes) but components are hardly touched. This is the second edition, some models have been sprayed using official Blood Angels red spray paint from GW. Item will be lightly packed if shipped out of the UK (to save on postage) at the request of the buyer.

Space Hulk + Deathwing + Genestealer! Perfect Condition. Complete + some bonus material from White Dwarf Magazine. The boxes of the two expansions are missing, as all of the components did fit into the big box back then... ;-)
German Edition (rules and Mission Book in german only); top condition; only shrink was removed; box shows shelf wear; money transfer (german:Ueberweisung) to my german bank account is preferred

Box is beat up (as one might expect with GW_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s cheap boxes of that era), minis are partially painted. Space Marines are basically done, Tyranids are just started. Contents are in great shape. Some of the original plastic terminators are switched out for metal terminators of the same era to add variety to the look. For example, one terminator captain has a small shield on his arm. This is the 2nd edition game, everything you need in one box. In addition, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included a bunch of scenarios found only in White Dwarf. If I remember correctly it is all the scenarios for 2nd edition released in WD along with all of the new rooms and objectives. I had a subscription for many years. Free shipping to the US. Others pay actual shipping.

This is for the 2nd Edition. All parts are present and in great shape. The mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s are all assembled and fully painted; the Space Marines in Blood Angel red and the Gene Stealers in purple and blue (I copied how the picture looks on the box cover). Box has some shelf wear but no dishing or tears. Also included are some print-outs I got from the web years ago. One looks like the 1st edition Gene Stealer expansion, one is the Deathwing expansion for the 1st edition, and the rest are extra scenarios and map sections. The scenarios are called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Duty And Honor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Bringer Of Sorrow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Fangs Of Fenris_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Fate Of The Sword Of Halcyon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.
Misc. Parts and Tiles
This game was a preorder.
Pictures on request. Components like new and complete Boxe acceptable.

Game is complete - all figures (unpainted), tiles, counters, rulebooks etc in very good condition, box has plenty of wear and a small hole in the bottom of the box. Shipping as follows: UK - £4.30 Europe - £9.00 Rest of World - £17.00

2nd edition Game unpunched except for terminators. Terminators are assembled, but still maintain all three points of articulation. None of the minis are painted or primed. Includes extra tokens and map components from White Dwarf magazine. Shipping is from 77807. The game is quite large and will not qualify for flat rate shipping. I am willing to work out any reasonable shipping with the buyer.

Included is: First Edition Space Hulk - All pieces present, all models present and glued together, some have primer on them. The Box has one split corner, but is in otherwise good shape. Deathwing Expansion - Everything is there except for the models. I do not have the box for this one, will be inside the base game box. Space Hulk Campaign Book - very good shape, the counters in the book are uncut. Shipping will be 25 for Priority Mail to anywhere in the lower 48.
This item is reserved for Dee Draper (familywontplay).

Box is only acceptable, although fully intact (see pictures). Components are in excellent condition. This is the copy that is reviewed in the following video: http://vimeo.com/6173107 I bought it from Josh when he got his 3rd edition copy. I liked the game so much I went ahead and bought a new copy. Then wife saw both boxes and gave me _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;the look_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. One has to go. The game includes several extras (see pictures): 1) additional tiles (those with the brown back in the pictures) 2) additional uncut floor sections (the big sheet-like ones in the pictures) 3) three White Dwarf magazines (#197, #199, #203), in wrapper, with additional scenarios and unpunched cards 4) 2-sided card stock play aids (which look so professional I originally thought they came with the game) I will happily accept cash for an in-person transfer in the San Francisco bay area. If you let me know in advance, I can carry it with me to LA where I visit every week for a similar no-shipping charges exchange. Otherwise paypal only.
2nd edition; miniatures unpainted; extra scenario_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s with new rooms, corridors and counters included, taken from the magazine THE WHITE DWARF.

This sale is for Space Hulk, the first edition. This item has been removed from its original shrinkwrap but the condition of the box is excellent with only slightly visible shelfwear. No items have been intentionally punched and no figures have been intentionally removed from their sprues. Content is 100%, nothing is missing. Some marine weapons have come loose from the sprues, as well as three marines. two of those marines are undamaged while the third has a broken antenna. The antenna exists and is inside the box (in a ziplock bag). Another marine still stuck to the sprue has a broken antenna (still stuck to the marine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s head). Both antennas can easily be glued back on the marines and once painted (even unpainted if one is careful) will not affect the look of the figure. A true collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s item, whether it is to enjoy it on the shelf or actually open it up and play with it. Pictures of the game, showing condition, are available. Contact me for further questions about shipping and payment.

First edition. 100% complete. Original unpainted terminators PLUS 2 squads of new GW terminators (undercoated black) on 25 mm bases (so they fit first edition tiles). Tiles and tokens are in excellent condition, as are the bugs which are sprayed black and look great. The box is a bit tatty and the rule books are showing their age but are in very good shape. Shipping to UK £7, to Europe £18
Auction for LordVonTush.
DALEKS STOLE MY LUNCHBOX sale only.

First edition (1989). Very slight scuff on box from handling. Contents are in mint condition, all miniatures are still attatched to sprues. Board pieces and tokens unpunched. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have pictures at the moment but happy to provide as required. Although I think the price is reasonable I am open to serious offers. Shipping costs approximately £5.00, rest assured I will only charge what it costs to send. If you have personal preferences regarding shipping or would like to collect in person just let me know.
For User: Unlucky Number Geeklist auction ended 12/4

First Edition, English. Was played a lot, but not in a terrible shape, for it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s age. The Box is the worst part, shelf wear and dents, but still in one piece, you know these GW boxes... Minis almost all assembled and painted, I think nothing is broken. Tiles and counters are in very good shape. Rule and mission books are used, but complete and usable. Besides: - 5 dice(easy to replace D6) - 4 bases for doors the game is complete. If you want to play this game, this set is for you! Please ask if there are questions! Shipping within Germany: 7Euros Otherwise please ask for quote. Payment by bank transfer within Germany/EU. Pay pal for the rest.

This is for the First edition of Space Hulk. Box has a little shelf wear but intact with no split corners. Components are complete and in great condition. Will combine with other items. Shipping 13.95

Game is complete and in very good condition (inc the box), the following are the only exceptions - - 1 Terminator is missing it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s antennae. - 2 Terminators have weakened/bent antennae. - 1 Genestealer snapped at the base but has been fixed. - 3-4 Genestealers need arms to be glued/re-glued. Nothing broken, just need to be assembled/reassembled Large box and fairly heavy so international buyers beware it will be expensive to ship and insure Payment by Paypal in sterling.

Box less 1st edition, minis unpainted and still on sprues, tiles and tokens unpunched. tokens are in german, but english rules are included. basically you get this: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/326475 with some additional board pieces. Note that you will need to cut the extra _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;long corridor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; sheet to get all the necessary parts.
complete

1st edition Good condition, some parts are unplayed (Genestealer minis are still _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;unpunched_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; for example. Checked and all components are in place, plus a couple of pages from a White Dwarf issue on some new rules, and some cut out tokens. postage £5 to UK Please check my other games, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to discount if more than 1 is brought... http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekstore.php3?action=viewuser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;username=jamessinden

***NOTE: THIS IS 1ST EDITION, NOT 3RD EDITION! I received this in a trade and never played it. The minis are all there and are stored in eggcrates. There is some box wear (this game is from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;80_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s!), and the some of the little antennae on the marines have snapped. Otherwise it is in really, really good condition with no missing parts.
For user christopherfritel from my auction Unpunched set of Genestealers from the 3rd edition. Paypal is ckoenig@gmail.com

First edition, complete. 5 of 10 Space Marines have broken antennas (very common issue) - Antennas are included and should be fixable with glue 18 Genestealers still totally or partially attached to sprues, other 2 are off sprues 1 extra 2 blip Box in very good shape, almost no shelf wear, one tiny tear in the middle of corner edge (not a split corner)

1st edition. Complete and in really nice shape. All miniatures on sprues except for one or two marines. All marine banner poles are intact. Domestic shipping is $17 via FedEx Ground. This is not for the entire game. This is for all my spare parts from the base game and both expansions. From Space Hulk I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including - The box - 45 out of the full set of 47 room and corridor tiles (except 2 x 1-sqr wide 5-sqr long corridors). - 20 x doors - 20 x stands - 12 x Genestealer figures (base coated) From Space Hulk: Deathwing Expansion I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including - 18 out of the full set of 20 room and corridor tiles (except 1 x 4-way intersection and 1 x 1-sqr wide 2-sqr long corridor) - 1 x cryotank - 5 x bulkheads - 4 x Genestealer figures each missing one arm (base coated) From Space Hulk: Genestealer Expansion I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including - 7 out of the full set of 9 room and corridor tiles. (except 2 x 3-sqr wide 3-sqr long corridor) I will sell these separately. Please contact me to discuss prices.

This listing is for the original Space Hulk 1st ed core set plus the Deathwing expansion. They are all in the same box, the Space Hulk box. The box for the expansion is no longer around. Most of the figures are painted to tabletop standard. The contents are complete with the following exceptions. All but one of the flamer attachments are missing from the core set. Other than this the core set and expansion is complete and all counters, corridors, figures and cards are in good condition.

This is the original Space Hulk (English Edition) and some extra floor tiles and articles. I estimate that the shipping would be $18 for shipping within the USA, but international shipping would depend on the country. I can get an exact figure when I have your address. One of the original 3 space corridor has been replaced with a slightly more used tile....not sure where the original went to. Also one of the original 6 sided die (it came with 5 normal d6) , has been replacement (not shown in picture) with a die of the same size but different color (black with red spots....I think it make s nice set 2x white with black spots, 2x red with white spots, and 1x black with red spots). Components are in good condition. The box shows some wear....they were pretty flimsy boxes. There is a slight tear in the Space Hulk rules manual. Three terminators are missing their antennas, and one of the marines is painted. Extras: - 13 extra articles with extra missions/campaigns, variants or rules and campaign for tactical marines. These articles are not the originals but copies from magazines. - extra floor tiles made by me from the articles - counters for weapons and such as so made by me from the articles. [ImageID=2824910] Let me know via geekmail if you have any questions.

I have the expansion Deathwing, Genestealer and extra metal figures etc. (shown here in the first 3 photos) if you want to contact me with an offer for the complete collection. Photos taken on 14/09/2016. As you can see, I have kept them all in great condition from new. Great condition considering they are all more than 25 years old. Cheers, Jamie

Includes Deathwing expansion in the same box, BUT not the Deathwing rulebook. You can probably find a PDF online someplace. The Deathwing box is NOT included. This one is from my childhood and has been lurking in attics for years. Box is a bit beat up. Minis are unpainted. All antennas on Terminators are broken. Genestealers are doing ok, only one has an arm and hand broken off, but you can glue those back on.
